Auth.error: An error occurred. Please try again.
Auth.signOutConfirmation: Are you sure you want to sign out?
Auth.configurationError: There is a problem with the server configuration.
Auth.accessDeniedError: You do not have permission to sign in.
Auth.verificationError: The verification link may have expired or has already been used.
Auth.verificationLinkSent: A sign in link has been sent to your email address.
Auth.checkSpam: If you don't see it in your inbox, check your spam folder.
